author: pipermerriam
content: <@456226577798135808> is your reasoning centered around whether the added efficiency is necessary or something else?

author: pipermerriam
content: (I'm personally inclined to push both binary trie-ification and code merklization forward)

author: Deleted User
content: I don't generally like "push for something" terminology. With all my plans, I am personally mostly concerned with the operational viability. If something is great, but I do not see a good way of migrating Eth1 there, I am not very interested (but other people obviously are, and that's good!). Code merkelisation and binary trie-ification are definitely desirable. I just don't know yet whether it would be more realistic to introduce them before or after the first ReGenesis event. I know that you would say "we should do it before", but it does not mean that it will be easy to do, if you know what I mean ðŸ™‚

author: Deleted User
content: i am not an adversary to any of these things and they did not "fall out of favour"

author: Deleted User
content: but i am constantly weighing different options for how realistic they can be introduced
